attributes.action: do everything in his power to make Fred Goodwin reject his £650,000 pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fred Goodwin, former chief of the Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS) is going to be receiving a £650,000 a year pension -despite his huge failings in managing the bank.

Frankly, even a tenth of this figure would be a phenomenal sum, the likes of which Joe Public will never see (indeed, us 'common' folk are more likely to see a hundredth of Fred's figure!).

To be honest, normal people deserve this pension far more than Fred.

Do what's right for a change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
